question: What is the name of the traditional garden in Kanazawa City, Japan, known as one of the three great gardens of Japan?
asked_question_translated: Vad heter den traditionella trädgården i Kanazawa City, Japan, känd som en av de tre stora trädgårdarna i Japan?
answer: Den traditionella trädgården i Kanazawa City, Japan, känd som en av de tre stora trädgårdarna i Japan, heter Kenrokuen.
answer_translated_eng: The traditional garden in Kanazawa City, Japan, known as one of the three great gardens of Japan, is called Kenrokuen.
